name: Greedy Ghost
description:
Are you a ghost? Probably, I'm not sure

Do you like money? Probably, I'm not sure

Do you like shotguns? Of course not, probably

use WASD, or ARROW KEYS to move and completing your dream!

Game was made for the MINIJAM:117 game jam!

only made in 2 days so expect a few bugs and glitches!

most of all, dodge the shotguns!
